thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 2 of 28
thread.title: Mark Whelan

author: Mark Whelan
title: Mark Whelan
text: I change my electricity supplier regularly as I shop around for the best value every year. As I keep a record of my annual usage I can compare offers easily on bonkers,ie. Since shopping around I have been with 4 different suppliers and all have provided a good service. Yet to come across one that offers existing customers contracts that equal those on offer to new customers. I expect to be moving again when my 12 months are up.
